JobService.description: The Job Service of a Redfish service allows scheduling and execution of long-duration processes.  It represents the properties for the Job Service itself and has links to the actual collection of Job resources.
JobService.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent a job service for a Redfish implementation.

title: #JobService.JobService
